Package gears.sidescroller.world.items

Class GearItem

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.WorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.items.AbstractItem
gears.sidescroller.world.items.GearItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable
public class GearItem extends AbstractItem
The GearItem is an item which the Player can pick up, then place in their Area as a PlacedGearMachine.

    Creates a new GearItem at the given coordinates in pixel-space

      Creates a new GearItem at the given coordinates in pixel-space
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the item
      y - the y-coordinate of the item
      color - the color of this item as it appears in the Area.
